testcase.name: Verify if place is being added using add place api
testcase.system-out: @ignore @AddPlace Scenario: Verify if place is being added using add place api # src/test/java/features/placeValidations.feature:7 Given Add Place payload # stepDefinitions.StepDefinition.add_place_payload() When user calls "AddPlaceAPI" with "POST" http request # stepDefinitions.StepDefinition.user_calls_with_http_request(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) { "status": "OK", "place_id": "b5d450bc954db5e82ca061773a91036c", "scope": "APP", "reference": "1b8526e1db672109e0a5492085e75cdf1b8526e1db672109e0a5492085e75cdf", "id": "1b8526e1db672109e0a5492085e75cdf" } Then the response is success with status code 200 # stepDefinitions.StepDefinition.the_response_is_success_with_status_code(java.lang.Integer) OK And "status" in response body is "OK" # stepDefinitions.StepDefinition.in_response_body_is(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) APP And "scope" in response body is "APP" # stepDefinitions.StepDefinition.in_response_body_is(java.lang.String,java.lang.String)

testcase.name: Verify if place is being added using add place api using data from test #1
testcase.system-out: @AddPlaceWithMultipleData Scenario Outline: Verify if place is being added using add place api using data from test # src/test/java/features/placeValidations.feature:25 Given Add Place payload with "Sangeetha" "English" "123, Main Street, City" # stepDefinitions.StepDefinition.add_place_payload_with(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) When user calls "AddPlaceAPI" with "Post" http request # stepDefinitions.StepDefinition.user_calls_with_http_request(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) { "status": "OK", "place_id": "052f3dfcbe9a28eb36f38445e67f74c7", "scope": "APP", "reference": "160550b6316253a125a20bd9f57f446c160550b6316253a125a20bd9f57f446c", "id": "160550b6316253a125a20bd9f57f446c" } Then the response is success with status code 200 # stepDefinitions.StepDefinition.the_response_is_success_with_status_code(java.lang.Integer) OK And "status" in response body is "OK" # stepDefinitions.StepDefinition.in_response_body_is(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) APP And "scope" in response body is "APP" # stepDefinitions.StepDefinition.in_response_body_is(java.lang.String,java.lang.String)

testcase.name: Verify if place is being added using add place api and get placeID
testcase.system-out: @GetPlace Scenario: Verify if place is being added using add place api and get placeID # src/test/java/features/placeValidations.feature:40 Given Add Place payload with "Sangeetha" "English" "123, Main Street, City" # stepDefinitions.StepDefinition.add_place_payload_with(java.lang.String,java.lang.String,java.lang.String) When user calls "AddPlaceAPI" with "POST" http request # stepDefinitions.StepDefinition.user_calls_with_http_request(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) { "status": "OK", "place_id": "d924eeb971f312274277d2de753b6b6e", "scope": "APP", "reference": "be4cb0a1ac0c8eeafc687950d273c93fbe4cb0a1ac0c8eeafc687950d273c93f", "id": "be4cb0a1ac0c8eeafc687950d273c93f" } Then the response is success with status code 200 # stepDefinitions.StepDefinition.the_response_is_success_with_status_code(java.lang.Integer) OK And "status" in response body is "OK" # stepDefinitions.StepDefinition.in_response_body_is(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) APP And "scope" in response body is "APP" # stepDefinitions.StepDefinition.in_response_body_is(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) d924eeb971f312274277d2de753b6b6e placeId: d924eeb971f312274277d2de753b6b6e { "location": { "latitude": "-38.383494", "longitude": "33.427362" }, "accuracy": "50", "name": "Sangeetha", "phone_number": "(+91) 983 893 3937", "address": "123, Main Street, City", "types": "shoe park,shop", "website": "http://google.com", "language": "English" } Sangeetha And verify place_id created maps to "Sangeetha" using "getPlaceAPI" # stepDefinitions.StepDefinition.verify_place_id_created_maps_to_using(java.lang.String,java.lang.String)

testcase.name: Verify Delete with deletePlaceAPI
